title.rendered: “Digiperform Is The Perfect Place To Imbibe The Complete Knowledge In Digital Marketing” – Bhavya Saxena

excerpt.rendered: [vc_row pix_particles_check=””][vc_column][vc_column_text]Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Bhavya Saxena, who is working as a Digital Marketing Trainer at Guru Nanak Dev Institute of Technology; just after completing her dCDMC training at Digiperform. In a chit-chat session, she has shared how Digiperform’s advanced digital marketing training program helped…
